Arid Surge

Turns the ground into Arid Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

Level-Up

The following Pokémon can equip this ability after reaching a certain level.
# Pokémon Type Level
022 Gigalith 90

Natural Ability

The following Pokémon can have this ability when you find them in the wild.
# Pokémon Type

The following Pokémon can have this ability as their hidden ability.
